keyToStrMap.1: He is a musician and he wants to be a famous pop star. Right now, he does a lot of busking.
keyToStrMap.2: When he performs well, lots of the townspeople gather to listen.
keyToStrMap.3: And his musician friends come out to join him.
keyToStrMap.4: He has a little trouble with knowing which words to sing though, and has heard that I might be able to help.

keyToStrMap.Full:
Milton the Musician

Occupation
[] Busker (previously a famous popstar)

Likes
[] Jamming with my friends, monkey spotting

Dislikes
[] Feeling uninspired

Favourite quote
[] I dream, therefore I exist.

Favourite people in the (living) world
[] All of my fans

How I came to be here
[] Boating accident

What I wish
[] To make millions of people happy
